name: 24/7 Support Line
description: 24-hour support line offers support via peer counseling, safety planning, and referrals for needed resources.
fullDescription: 24-hour support line offers support via peer counseling, safety planning, and referrals for needed resources.
whatTheyOffer: The W.O.M.A.N., Inc. 24-hour support line offers support via peer counseling, safety planning, and referrals for needed resources. On their support line, they also connect with family and friends of survivors.
howToGetIt: You can call them 24 hours a day, 7 days a week at: (877) 384-3578
